episodes.name: Open System Preferences
episodes.description: User opens System Preferences from the Dock to access system settings
steps: Click on System Preferences icon in the Dock
Wait for System Preferences window to open
Window displays with all preference panes visible

episodes.name: Navigate to Displays Settings
episodes.description: User navigates to the Displays preference pane to access Night Shift settings
steps: Click on 'Displays' icon in System Preferences
Wait for Displays pane to load

episodes.name: Disable Night Shift
episodes.description: User turns off Night Shift by unchecking the schedule checkbox
steps: Verify Night Shift is now off
